channel.title: Mind Blowing on Grad Student Problems

item.title: Icarus
item.description: “The choice for mankind lies between freedom and happiness and for the great bulk of mankind, happiness is better.” - 1984 Icarus is a shocking film about an American filmmaker getting intertwined with head of the Russian anti-doping lab Rodchenkov during the unfolding of the Russian doping scandal. It starts out with the juxtaposition of Lance Armstrong’s testimonies before and after his conviction of guilt, and that sets the tone for the rest of the film.
